name: The Four Old Gods
description:
A long time ago, the world was torn apart by forces unknown, and magic was wiped out from the world. However, four mages survived and lived together, and protect the last relic of magic in hopes of one day restoring their world to its former glory.

Unfortunately, the demons who destroyed magic are also hunting them, and the four last mages find their home base overrun...

---

A real-time with pause strategy game prototyped for Enbyjam 2016. Control your units with the mouse, and then press and hold SPACE to move forward in time. Releasing the SPACE bar freezes time, allowing you to change tactics and command your allies while the world is paused.

The initial version of the game was made in the course of a week for Enbyjam 2016. An updated version was released August 23, 2016 to fix bugs and add sound effects.
